Image: Movie Name: Schedule:
{{s.movieName}} {{s.hour}}:{{s.minutes}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ShowingService } from '../services/showing.service'; import { ShowingModel } from '../models/showing.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list-showing', templateUrl: './list-showing.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list-showing.component.css'] }) export class ListShowingComponent implements OnInit { showings? : ShowingModel[]; constructor(private showingService : ShowingService){} ngOnInit(): void { try{ this.showingService.getShowings().subscribe(data=>{ console.log("Info GET Showing: "+data); this.showings = data; }); }catch(e){ console.log("error: "+ e); } } }
